00461     boost::any d = selected.data(UserRole);

00463       std::string folder = boost::any_cast<std::string>(d);

00467       // escaped -- or use the \Q \E qutoing escape regular expression
00468       // syntax (and escape \E)

00477       // Select the item, it was not yet selected.

00497       popup_->addMenu("File Deployments", subMenu);
00498 
00499       /*
00500        * This is one method of executing a popup, which does not block a
00501        * thread for a reentrant event loop, and thus scales.
00502        *
00503        * Alternatively you could call WPopupMenu::exec(), which returns
00504        * the result, but while waiting for it, blocks the thread.
00505        */      
00506       popup_->aboutToHide().connect(this, &TreeViewDragDrop::popupAction);
00507       popup_->popup(event);
00508     }
00509   }

00516        * You could also bind extra data to an item using setData() and

00527       popupActionBox_->show();

void TreeViewDragDrop::populateFiles (  )  [inline, private]

Populate the files model.

Data (and headers) is read from the CSV file data/files.csv. We add icons to the first column, resolve the folder id to the actual folder name, and configure item flags, and parse date values.

Definition at line 548 of file TreeViewDragDrop.C.

00548                        {
00549     fileModel_->invisibleRootItem()->setRowCount(0);
00550 
00551     std::ifstream f((appRoot() + "data/files.csv").c_str());
00552 
00553     if (!f)
00554       throw std::runtime_error("Could not read: data/files.csv");
00555 
00556     readFromCsv(f, fileModel_);
00557 
00558     for (int i = 0; i < fileModel_->rowCount(); ++i) {
00559       WStandardItem *item = fileModel_->item(i, 0);
00560       item->setFlags(item->flags() | ItemIsDragEnabled);
00561       item->setIcon("icons/file.gif");
00562 
00563       std::string folderId = item->text().toUTF8();
00564 
00565       item->setData(boost::any(folderId), UserRole);
00566       item->setText(folderNameMap_[folderId]);
00567 
00568       convertToDate(fileModel_->item(i, 4));
00569       convertToDate(fileModel_->item(i, 5));
00570     }
00571   }

WStandardItem* TreeViewDragDrop::createFolderItem ( const WString &  location,
const std::string &  folderId = std::string() 
) [inline, private]

Create a folder item.

Configures flags for drag and drop support.

Definition at line 612 of file TreeViewDragDrop.C.

00614   {
00615     WStandardItem *result = new WStandardItem(location);
00616 
00617     if (!folderId.empty()) {
00618       result->setData(boost::any(folderId));
00619       result->setFlags(result->flags() | ItemIsDropEnabled);
00620       folderNameMap_[folderId] = location;
00621     } else
00622       result->setFlags(result->flags().clear(ItemIsSelectable));
00623 
00624     result->setIcon("icons/folder.gif");
00625 
00626     return result;
00627   }
